News.headline: The Chigwell Construction Stadium Selected For FA Sunday Cup Semi Final
News.page_title: The Chigwell Construction Stadium Selected For FA Sunday Cup Semi Final
News.URL_keywords: Chigwell Construction Stadium Selected For FA Sunday Cup Semi Final
News.short_description: The Chigwell Construction Stadium has been chosen by the FA to host a prestigious national competition semi-final
News.description:
The FA Sunday Cup Semi-Final between current cup holders New Salamis FC and Chessington United FC will be played at our home and this tie will take place on Sunday 12th March.

The game will kick-off at 2pm and admission prices for both semi-finals are priced at: Adults £4.00; U16's and OAP's £1.00.

The other semi-final will be between Home & Bargain FC and Hardwick Social FC will be played at Guiseley AFC on the same date.
